name: Introduction
text:
Once upon a time in a land far away.
  Under a purple sun, on a globe of orange clay.

  A family of Scaries walking this way,
  The run, the laugh, they hug, they play.

  A big one and a small one, they stroll hand in hand.
  Just like you and me, big hand and small hand.

  The small one is Itty Bitty,
  with her diaper and crazy hair.

  The big one is Big Scary,
  with his asymmetrical horns
  and his jovial smile.

  The stroll through the orange woods,
  looking for mama.

  She is out there somewhere,
  and they must find her.

0.currentQuestion: Lil & Big Scary see something interesting! What do they see?!
0.text: Big and Lil walk and talk and think about things, they loo high and low to find gum berries!

optionRight.name: Big thing
optionRight.text: It is tall and grumbly, with scary eyes and giant hands! Lil Scary is scared, but Big Scary has a plan.
